summary: This document is a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell to Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services, authorizing a wire transfer of $1,000,000 from her account to a specified fund. The letter includes banking details and serves as a formal request for the transaction.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the sender of the letter, authorizing a wire transfer from her account.

persons.name: Scott Stackman
persons.context: Scott Stackman is addressed in the letter as the recipient at UBS Financial Services, responsible for processing the wire transfer.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is a client of Scott Stackman, who works at UBS Financial Services, indicating a financial advisory relationship.

events.title: Wire Transfer Authorization
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell authorizes a wire transfer of $1,000,000 from her account to the CargoMetrics Compass Fund LP.

locations: 299 Park Avenue, 25th Floor, New York, NY 10171
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell authorized a wire transfer of $1,000,000.
The transfer was directed to the CargoMetrics Compass Fund LP.
The document includes specific banking details such as ABA and SWIFT codes.
